revised_title: On Skew Refraction through a Lens and the Hollow Pencil Generated by an Annulus of a Very Obliquely Placed Lens
tldr: The author investigates skew refraction through a lens and the hollow pencil produced by an annulus of a lens placed at a large obliquity. They develop a method for calculating the direction-cosines of refracted rays and apply it to a specific case of a plano-convex lens annulus. The study reveals the primary and secondary focal lines and the behavior of the pencil in different sections.
